channel.title: I need more help
channel.description:
Ok so I have my source and I can get on and everything but when I give myself character rights of 5 I don't get the little crown thing that the owner's have. Also, how can I change it so that the npc's talk about like the name of my server and not the source it's on.
Thanks.
P.S. this is my first time making a server so ya I know I'm a noob.

item.title: I need more help
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

0 =normal player
1 = mod
2 = administrator
3 = owner
4 = hidden administrator

[quote=“I Luv Haters, post:1, topic:235758”]Ok so I have my source and I can get on and everything but when I give myself character rights of 5 I don’t get the little crown thing that the owner’s have. Also, how can I change it so that the npc’s talk about like the name of my server and not the source it’s on.
0 =normal player
1 = mod
2 = administrator
3 = owner
4 = hidden administrator

4 is only in some servers hope i helped

Thanks.

P.S. this is my first time making a server so ya I know I’m a noob.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: I need more help
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Rights:
0 = Player
1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Owner
4 = Hidden Owner - Hidden because of no crown.

Read full topic

item.title: I need more help
item.dc:creator: @I_Luv_Haters I Luv Haters
item.description:
@I_Luv_Haters wrote:

Oh ok, thanks. Someone on another thread said that owners had rights of 5.

Read full topic

item.title: I need more help
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Try searching for the name in the files and change it. once you’ve done that, save the file and compile it.

Owner’s usually have the rights of 3, not 5.

Read full topic
